# Color Commands Complete reference for Vista Graphics color and gradient commands. ## Color Functions - **rgb**: Create RGB color - **rgba**: Create RGBA color with alpha - **hsl**: Create HSL color - **hsla**: Create HSLA color ## Gradient Functions - **linear**: Create linear gradient - **radial**: Create radial gradient - **conic**: Create conic gradient ## Color Utilities - **lerpColor**: Interpolate between colors - **color-to-hex**: Convert to hex - **hex-to-color**: Convert from hex ## See Also - [API Reference](/wiki/graphics/api-reference/) - All graphics APIs - [Colors](/wiki/graphics/colors/) - Color reference
